name: Christmas Quash Free
description:
NO IN-APP PURCHASE!!!

Just PURE FUN!!!

Be warned: this game is insanely addictive and viral.

******************************************************************************

Help Santa Claus collect coins in order for him to buy toys for the children this Christmas.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?
1. Tap on the unlocked Christmas ball to start the level.
2. Read and accept the challenge statement from Santa Claus.
3. Connect three or more same Christmas objects (Christmas ball,tree,snowman,bell,etc) and get coins.
4. The Santa object is special object wherein it can represent other object to form a match.
5. Finish all 49 levels and get your surprise.

Challenges:
Each level has its different challenge type such as:
1) Get x coins in m moves.
2) Crush s Santa in m moves.
3) Get x coins in t seconds.
4) Crush s Santa in t seconds.
5) Get x coins and s Santa in m moves.
6) Get x coins and s Santa in t seconds.
7) Get x coins and s Santa in t seconds and m moves.

Have fun playing the game.

Don't forget to right a review and rate it.

Thanks in advance.

Enjoy the game !!!
******************************************************************************
